meanings.definition: A type of large passenger ship.
meanings.sent1: The superliners sailed across the ocean with many passengers onboard.
meanings.sent2: The cruise company added new superliners to their fleet to accommodate more travelers.
meanings.sent3: The superliners had a race to see which one could reach the port first.
meanings.sent4: The superliners stood tall in the harbor, towering over the smaller boats.
meanings.sent5: The superliners were like floating cities, complete with restaurants and entertainment.

meanings.definition: The most powerful or impressive of its kind.
meanings.sent1: In the superhero movie, the villain had a team of superliners to do his bidding.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed the superliners of ancient kings, showcasing their wealth and power.
meanings.sent3: The superliners of the animal kingdom were the lions, ruling over the savannah.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was a superliner, commanding attention whenever she spoke.
meanings.sent5: The mountain range stood like a row of superliners, dominating the landscape.
